myExercises.title: My exercises
myExercises.activeProgramsDescription: Below you'll find all your active exercise programs from completed assessments.
myExercises.endedProgramsDescription: Below you will find all programs you have already ended.

1.title: Neurodynamic exercises: what, why, when?
1.description: Ever heard of nerve flossing? If you have pain caused by nerve irritation or compression, nerve flossing is worth a try.

2.title: Preventing back pain at work
2.description: Tips for proper sitting, ergonomic workspace setup and exercises you can do during the work day.

3.title: Stretching for a healthy spine
3.description: A simple stretching routine to keep your spine healthy and flexible.

4.title: Exercise and nutrition
4.description: How proper nutrition aids recovery and strengthens the back muscles.

5.title: Common exercise mistakes
5.description: Avoid these common errors that can worsen back pain instead of easing it.

6.title: Rehabilitation exercises after injury
6.description: Recommended practices and exercises for rehabilitation after spinal injury or surgery.

assessment.title: Pain assessment
assessment.subtitle: Fill the questionnaire to get personalized exercise recommendations

cookie.message: This site uses cookies to enhance your experience. By using our site, you agree to our cookie policy.

generalProgram.hint: Fill in more pain questionnaires to create a personalized program
generalProgram.description: No time for individual exercise programs? Here's a personalized plan with the most important exercises from your current programs.

banner.message: A new week, a new challenge! Don't postpone your exercises and start today ðŸ¤©

mood.infoText: Average score from the last {{days}} days is based on your daily mood entries. The closer your score is to 3, the better you feel.
mood.infoFollow: Watch how your overall score changes over time.
mood.better: Better trend in the last {{days}} days
mood.worse: Worse trend in the last {{days}} days

welcome.title: Welcome to Pebee therapist
welcome.subtitle: Please sign in to access the questionnaire and personalized exercise programs.

calendar.title: Exercise calendar
calendar.text: Track your progress with our intuitive exercise calendar. See exactly when you exercised, how many active days you have and how much you saved. Stay motivated with daily results and keep a consistent routine.

programs.title: My exercises and programs
programs.text: Access personalized exercise programs tailored to your needs. Each exercise is designed specifically for your pain type and condition. Track active programs and stay motivated with a clear overview of your exercises.

assessment.title: Pain assessment
assessment.text: Comprehensive assessment of your musculoskeletal pain using an interactive 3D model. Precisely identify problem areas and get personalized recommendations. Our advanced system analyzes your symptoms and suggests the most suitable treatment plan.

footer.title: Pebee therapist
footer.rights: Â© 2024 Pebee therapist. All rights reserved.

exercisePlan.suitableQuestion: Does this exercise work for you?
exercisePlan.painQuestion: 1. Does the exercise cause you pain?
exercisePlan.changeQuestion: 2. Do you want to change this exercise?
exercisePlan.changeRequestInfo: We will contact you about a suitable replacement once you submit this request.
exercisePlan.replacementErrorDescription: Try contacting a physiotherapist or change the criteria.
exercisePlan.exerciseChangedDesc: The selected exercise has been replaced with a new one.
exercisePlan.markedGood: You marked the exercise as suitable.

importantNotice.title: Important notice
importantNotice.text: These exercises serve only as general recommendations and do not replace a visit to a physiotherapist or doctor. If you experience increased pain, dizziness, or any discomfort during exercise, stop immediately and seek professional help.

goals.title: My goals
goals.exerciseText: I want to exercise {dropdown} times per week
goals.blogText: I want to read {dropdown} blogs per week

profileForm.title: Fill in your personal information
profileForm.goalsSubtitle: You can set goals or skip and set them later in your profile.

privacy.title: Privacy policy â€“ Musculoskeletal pain questionnaire
privacy.intro: Your trust and data security are key for us. Therefore we would like to inform you how we process personal data provided through the pain questionnaire.
privacy.email: Email address: We store and process only your email to send questionnaire results, additional recommendations or to contact you about our services if you have given consent.
privacy.health: Health information: We do not store or process information about your pain and health condition provided in the questionnaire. They are used solely for immediate evaluation and personalization and are not stored afterwards.
privacy.whyTitle: Why do we process your email?
whyList: To send additional recommendations or educational content.
To communicate about our services if you agreed to receive marketing information.
privacy.protectTitle: How do we protect your data?
privacy.protectText: We protect your email with modern technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration or loss.
privacy.rightsIntro: In accordance with GDPR you have the right:
rightsList: to rectify or erase personal data,
to withdraw consent at any time.
privacy.contact: To exercise your rights contact us at privacy@example.com.
privacy.endText: Your privacy is our priority. We process only necessary minimal data and do not store or archive health information.
